org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore

Interface MetaStoreThread

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Cleaner, Initiator, StatsUpdaterThread, Worker

    public interface MetaStoreThread
extends org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable
    A thread that runs in the metastore, separate from the threads in the thrift service.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init(AtomicBoolean stop, AtomicBoolean looped)
      Initialize the thread.
      void setThreadId(int threadId)
      Set the id for this thread.
      void start()
      Run the thread in the background.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable

        getConf, setConf

    • Method Detail

      • setThreadId

        void setThreadId(int threadId)
        Set the id for this thread.
        Parameters:
        threadId - id of the thread

      • init

        void init(AtomicBoolean stop,
          AtomicBoolean looped)
   throws MetaException
        Initialize the thread. This must not be called until after Configurable.setConf(Configuration) and setThreadId(int) have been called.
        Parameters:
        stop - a flag to watch for when to stop. If this value is set to true, the thread will terminate the next time through its main loop.
        looped - a flag that is set to true everytime a thread goes through it's main loop. This is purely for testing so that tests can assure themselves that the thread has run through it's loop once. The test can set this value to false. The thread should then assure that the loop has been gone completely through at least once.
        Throws:
        MetaException

      • start

        void start()
        Run the thread in the background. This must not be called until init(java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean,java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean) has been called.
